thread.section_title: Residence du Roy Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing value for the money
thread.title_full: Amazing value for the money - Review of Residence du Roy Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: IceNineJon
title: Amazing value for the money
text:
We decided to go to Paris with some friends who found this hotel online for an amazing rate given the location and how expensive Paris can be. We booked a suite with them which consisted of a large living room, a bedroom, a bathroom with a toilet/sink, and a bathroom with a shower/sink. The divider between the bedroom and living room can be closed for privacy and the hotel had already made up the couch and pullout trundle (twin size beds) for our friends.
The room came with breakfast which was okay (nothing great but not bad).
The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating.
The location was fantastic. Paris is very walkable and the location is in the heart of Paris on a somewhat quiet street but only a short walk to a lot of the sites.
Overall, we were amazed at the price given the location. We'd definitely stay here again.
